biotools.summary: A Java package that utilises a series of D2 statistics to extract k-mers (subsequences at defined k length) from a set of biological sequences, and generate pairwise distances for each possible pair. This distance can be used directly for phylogenetic inference using neighbour-joining.

bioschemas.name: jD2Stat
